item.title: How woke capitalists' gravy train came to a juddering halt
item.author: telegraph.co.uk
item.description:
When Mark Carney corralled 450 finance companies to tackle climate change at Cop26, it seemed like his crowning achievement.
Carney's Glasgow Financial Alliance for Net Zero, as it was known, joined together companies that controlled $130 trillion of customers' cash. These banks, fund managers and ...
